chasePlayers(Player) - Method in class com.rad.entity.Enemy
an A* search to find player and capture it How an A* algorithim works is that it places its location in a priority que.
checkPossibleMoveLocations(Location, Location, HashMap<Location, Double>, PriorityQueue<Location>) - Method in class com.rad.entity.Enemy
checks the next possible move state, it uses a hueristic to calculate the best possible move to add to the priority que it uses hypothetical positions that the enemy can go to, then checks the hashmap for the nieghbors and adds it to the que and the map.
